reviewText: I thought that this movie was in Portuguese, which is what I wanted.  Alas, it is in Spanish.  Disappointed.  f

Considering its era, the film is well directed and the feeling of Brazil is very real.  It was good to brush up on my Spanish while reading the sub-titles.  I actually danced in a scene that was filmed in Madrid, but alas, it has been cut.
Be aware, English is not provided in sub-titles.
